article_title: Kentucky health gains are real, worth defending
article_text:
Horse park commission votes for a new director

Lafayette sweeps top seeds to win district title

00:40

article_metadata.description: The Foundation for a Healthy Kentucky recently released a quarterly update of its ongoing evaluation of the impact of the Affordable Care Act in Kentucky. The data are compelling evidence that health-care reform is working and that we are beginning to overcome the barriers to good health that have held us back for generations.
article_metadata.title: Kentucky health gains are real, worth defending | Lexington Herald-Leader
